sys_script.name: Location Contact API

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_b3d5396cdbe654508a521fe968961916
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_inmis_im_itad_imitad_location</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_inmis_im_itad_imitad_location">itad_locationidISNOTEMPTY^itad_locationidVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="itad_locationid" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="itad_locationid" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Location Contact API</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    try {
        var authenticationDetails = new IngramUtils().tokenValidation(current);
        // To insert/update location contacts

        gs.info('Location Contact create/update API started.');
        // create pickup contact list
        var pickupContactInformation = [];
        var pickupcontactlist = current.pickup_contact.toString();
        var PickupContactArray = pickupcontactlist.split(",");
        //Prepare serialized asset level information
        //gs.info("pickupcontactlist" + pickupcontactlist);
        for (var PickupContactInfo = 0; PickupContactInfo < PickupContactArray.length; PickupContactInfo++) {
            var record1 = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
            if (record1.get(PickupContactArray[PickupContactInfo])) {
                var contactInformation = {
                    "PickUpContactName": record1.getDisplayValue('first_name').toString() + "" + record1.getDisplayValue('last_name').toString(),
                    "FirstName": record1.getDisplayValue('first_name').toString(),
                    "LastName": record1.getDisplayValue('last_name').toString(),
                    "EmployeeStatus": "A",
                    "Email": record1.getDisplayValue('email').toString(),
                    "EmployeePhone": record1.getDisplayValue('phone').toString(),
                    "EmployeeMobile": record1.getDisplayValue('mobile_phone').toString(),
                    "HireDate": record1.getDisplayValue('sys_created_on').toString()

                };
                pickupContactInformation.push(contactInformation);

            }
        }
        //gs.info('pickupContactInformation!!!!:' + JSON.stringify(pickupContactInformation));
        //cretae pickup contact

        var r1 = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_inmis_im_itad.Create Update Location Contact', 'post');
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('Token', authenticationDetails.Token);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('SourceID', authenticationDetails.sourceid);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('locationID', current.itad_locationid);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('Facility', current.itad_facility.facilityid);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('Currency', current.currency.currencyid);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('locationCity', current.location.city);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('TimeZone', current.time_zone.timezoneid);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('ZipPostalCode', current.location.zip);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('PickUpContactInformation', JSON.stringify(pickupContactInformation));
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('PrimaryContactName', current.primary_contact.first_name + " " + current.primary_contact.last_name);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('PrimaryFirstName', current.primary_contact.first_name);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('PrimaryLastName', current.primary_contact.last_name);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('PrimaryEmployeeStatus', current.primary_contact.active == true ? "A" : "D");
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('PrimaryEmail', current.primary_contact.email);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('PrimaryEmployeePhone', current.primary_contact.phone);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('PrimaryEmployeeMobile', current.primary_contact.mobile_phone);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('PrimaryHireDate', current.primary_contact.sys_created_on);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('AlternateContactName', current.alternate_contact.first_name + " " + current.alternate_contact.last_name);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('AlternateFirstName', current.alternate_contact.first_name);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('AlternateLastName', current.alternate_contact.last_name);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('AlternateEmployeeStatus', current.alternate_contact.active == true ? "A" : "D");
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('AlternateEmail', current.alternate_contact.email);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('AlternateEmployeePhone', current.alternate_contact.phone);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('AlternateEmployeeMobile', current.alternate_contact.mobile_phone);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('AlternateHireDate', current.alternate_contact.sys_created_on);
        r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('CreateLocationbaseUrl', gs.getProperty('x_inmis_im_itad.CreateLocation') + 'Contact');

        var response2 = r1.execute();
        var responseBody2 = response2.getBody();
        var httpStatus2 = response2.getStatusCode();
        var requestBody2 = JSON.parse(r1.getRequestBody());
        requestBody2.LocationInformation.Token = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.PickupContactInformation = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.PrimaryContactInformation.PrimaryContactName = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.PrimaryContactInformation.PrimaryFirstName = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.PrimaryContactInformation.PrimaryLastName = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.PrimaryContactInformation.PrimaryEmail = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.PrimaryContactInformation.PrimaryEmployeePhone = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.PrimaryContactInformation.PrimaryEmployeeMobile = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.AlternateContactInformation.AlternativeContactName = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.AlternateContactInformation.FirstName = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.AlternateContactInformation.LastName = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.AlternateContactInformation.Email = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.AlternateContactInformation.EmployeePhone = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";
        requestBody2.AlternateContactInformation.EmployeeMobile = "XXXXXXXXXXXX";


        gs.info('Location Contact Request Body: ' + JSON.stringify(requestBody2));
        gs.info("Location Contact Response Body: " + responseBody2);

        gs.info('Location contact create/update  request created successfully.');
    } catch (ex) {
        var message = ex.message;
        gs.error(message);
        gs.info("Location BR [Location Contact API]: " + ex);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Munimohan.Bathala@ness.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-07 11:41:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>b3d5396cdbe654508a521fe968961916</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Location Contact API</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Ingram Micro IT Asset Disposition" source="x_inmis_im_itad">df95bbf0dbc17f008a521fe968961950</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Ingram Micro IT Asset Disposition">df95bbf0dbc17f008a521fe968961950</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b3d5396cdbe654508a521fe968961916</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Munimohan.Bathala@ness.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-07 11:41:00</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b3d5396cdbe654508a521fe968961916"/></record_update>
